pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mathematical Modeling of Infectious Disease // Tools for simulating mathematical models of infectious disease. Epidemic model classes include deterministic compartmental models, stochastic agent-based, and stochastic network models. Network models use robust statistical methods of exponential-family random graph models (ERGMs) from the Statnet suite of software packages in R. Standard templates for epidemic modeling include SI, SIR, and SIS disease types. EpiModel features an easy API for extending these templates to address novel scientific research aims.
